div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where COMPONENT = LP121003-0 (Pathology biopsy report)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept descends from 371528001 (Pathology report)

title.value: Set de Valores de los Reportes de Biopsia

description.value: Códigos de tipos de reportes de biopsias en Snomed y LOINC
